title: Ticket #6236: Redesign fault tolerance
description: Much of the current annex tool -- the bulk request in particular -- uses a ClassAdLog for fault tolerance. This was originally written assuming one annex daemon per system, so recovery consists of being restarted by the master and picking up where the ClassAdLog indicates we left off. That's probably not a good assumption for a command-line tool, but it may be worth preserving if we turn the command-line tool into a per-user daemon.
